description: The sacred land of Skypiea that serves as God's domain. Revealed in this episode to be the part of Jaya that was shot into the sky 400 years ago by the Knock Up Stream.

keyEvents.title: Upper Yard's True Origin Revealed
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats discover that Upper Yard was once part of Jaya, the island that Mont Blanc Noland visited 400 years ago.
keyEvents.significance: This revelation is the key to understanding the entire Skypiea conflict and validates Noland's story, connecting two major arcs.

keyEvents.title: Shandia Launch Major Assault
keyEvents.description: Wyper leads the Shandia warriors in a major offensive to reclaim Upper Yard from Enel.
keyEvents.significance: Escalates the war for Upper Yard and brings all factions into direct conflict.

statusHistory.reason: The truth about Upper Yard's origin as part of Jaya is revealed

description: An island in Paradise that was once shaped like a skull. 400 years ago, over half of the island was shot into the sky by the Knock Up Stream, becoming Upper Yard in Skypiea.

keyEvents.title: Jaya-Upper Yard Connection Revealed
keyEvents.description: It is revealed that Jaya and Upper Yard were once the same island, split apart 400 years ago.
keyEvents.significance: Explains the mystery of the City of Gold and validates Mont Blanc Noland's legacy.

description: The ancient city of gold that once existed on Jaya. After being shot into the sky 400 years ago, its ruins now lie within Upper Yard. This is the legendary city that Mont Blanc Noland discovered.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Shandora Ruins
keyEvents.description: Nami discovers buildings from Shandora, including the other half of Noland's house, providing physical proof of the ancient city's existence.
keyEvents.significance: First direct evidence of Shandora that the Straw Hats encounter, confirming the City of Gold is real.

statusHistory.reason: Discovered by the Straw Hats as ancient ruins on Upper Yard
